ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Lock picking the Hole
ygData.msgSnippet: Invis and Invis to undead do not stack.  They LOOK like they stack, but only the last one cast is actually in effect.  They are supposed to fix this soon. Only
ygData.messageBody:
Invis and Invis to undead do not stack. They LOOK like they stack, but only
the last one cast is actually in effect. They are supposed to fix this
soon.

Only rogues can do both at once, via hide+sneak.

Rokenn

> move as slowly when their invisible as rogues do when hiding

> what he probably meant was that bards cannot sneak and hide
> at the same
> time, which is what makes rogues so good at most CR
> situations. for rogues
> if you sneak and hide at the same time, you can move around
> while hidden.
> no other class can do this.
